commit_message:
fix: update all hooks to use correct Claude Code PreToolUse/PostToolUse format

- Converted before_write hooks to PreToolUse with proper matchers
- Updated duplicate function detector to trigger on Write/Edit R files
- Updated R code review to trigger on Write/Edit R/Rmd/Rnw files
- All hooks now use proper Claude Code event format with environment variables
- Minor formatting fix in add_residuals.R roxygen documentation
